meanings.definition: A type of mushroom with long, thin stems and small caps.
meanings.sent1: The enoki mushroom has very slender stems.
meanings.sent2: I added enoki to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The enoki mushroom looked like a tiny forest in the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her dish was a bouquet of enoki, delicate and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The enoki mushroom's appearance is like little white fingers reaching up.

meanings.definition: The edible fungus produced by the enoki mushroom.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the enoki in my salad.
meanings.sent2: Enoki mushrooms are delicious in stir-fries.
meanings.sent3: The enoki mushroom danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The enoki mushroom's flavor was a symphony of delight.
meanings.sent5: The enoki mushroom added a delightful crunch to the dish.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare food using enoki mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: She will enoki the stir-fry for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I enoki the noodles with these mushrooms.
meanings.sent3: Let's enoki the soup to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent4: He enokis the dish with a sprinkle of these mushrooms.
meanings.sent5: Enokiing the dish will give it a unique twist.
